headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Bombushka Run
content: It’s something you’ve asked yourself many times: if you and your crew were behind the controls of a turret-covered flying juggernaut, how long would you last against a fleet of nimble attack helicopters? Only one way to find out for sure: in this Adversary Mode, two teams take turns as hunters and hunted with top place going to whoever racks up the most time on the run.
